queryHeight.name: height
queryHeight.description: optional block height, defaults to current tip

warning.example: Do not cache this response. Do not send funds after the expiry.

recommended_gas_rate.description: the recommended gas rate to use for the inbound to ensure timely confirmation

inbound_confirmation_seconds.description: the approximate seconds for block confirmations required before processing

router.description: the EVM chain router contract address

dust_threshold.description: Defines the minimum transaction size for the chain in base units (sats, wei, uatom). Transactions with asset amounts lower than the dust_threshold are ignored.

expected_amount_out.description: the amount of the target asset the user can expect to withdraw after fees in 1e8 decimals

inbound_confirmation_blocks.description: the approximate number of source chain blocks required before processing

notes.example: Transfer the inbound_address the asset with the memo. Do not use multi-in, multi-out transactions.

gas_rate_units.description: the units of the recommended gas rate

dust_amount.description: the dust amount of the target asset the user should send to initialize the withdraw, the client can send this OR provide the memo

inbound_address.description: the inbound address for the transaction on the source chain

outbound_delay_seconds.description: the approximate seconds for the outbound delay before it will be sent

recommended_min_amount_in.description: The recommended minimum inbound amount for this transaction type & inbound asset. Sending less than this amount could result in failed refunds.

memo.description: generated memo for the withdraw, the client can use this OR send the dust amount

outbound_delay_blocks.description: the number of thorchain blocks the outbound will be delayed

membership.description: the list of node public keys which are members of the vault

total_value.description: value in rune of the vault's assets

units.description: units of trade asset belonging to this owner

owner.description: thor address of trade account owner

last_add_height.description: last thorchain height trade assets were added to trade account

last_withdraw_height.description: last thorchain height trade assets were withdrawn from trade account

pool_slip.description: Pool slip for this asset's pool for the current height

rollup_count.description: Number of stored pool slips contributing to the current stored rollup

long_rollup.description: Median of rollup snapshots over a long period

rollup.description: Stored sum of pool slips over a number of previous block heights

summed_rollup.description: Summed pool slips over a number of previous block heights, to checksum the stored rollup

outbound_delay_blocks.description: the number of thorchain blocks the outbound will be delayed

notes.example: Transfer the inbound_address the asset with the memo. Do not use multi-in, multi-out transactions.

membership.description: the list of node public keys which are members of the vault

clout_spent.description: clout spent in RUNE for the outbound

aggregator_target_limit.description: the minimum amount of SwapOut asset to receive (else cancelling the SwapOut and receiving THORChain's output)

order_type.description: market if immediately completed or refunded, limit if held until fulfillable

destination.description: the destination address to receive the swap output

trade_target.description: the minimum amount of output asset to receive (else cancelling and refunding the swap)

affiliate_basis_points.description: the affiliate fee in basis points

aggregator.description: the contract address if an aggregator is specified for a non-THORChain SwapOut

aggregator_target_address.description: the desired output asset of the aggregator SwapOut

stream_quantity.description: number of swaps to execute in a streaming swap

stream_interval.description: the interval (in blocks) to execute the streaming swap

target_asset.description: the asset to be swapped to

affiliate_address.description: the affiliate address which will receive any affiliate fee

outbound_delay_seconds.description: the approximate seconds for the outbound delay before it will be sent

notes.example: Transfer the inbound_address the asset with the memo. Do not use multi-in, multi-out transactions.

inbound_confirmation_blocks.description: the approximate number of source chain blocks required before processing

inbound_confirmation_seconds.description: the approximate seconds for block confirmations required before processing

dust_threshold.description: Defines the minimum transaction size for the chain in base units (sats, wei, uatom). Transactions with asset amounts lower than the dust_threshold are ignored.

recommended_min_amount_in.description: The recommended minimum inbound amount for this transaction type & inbound asset. Sending less than this amount could result in failed refunds.

recommended_gas_rate.description: the recommended gas rate to use for the inbound to ensure timely confirmation

gas_rate_units.description: the units of the recommended gas rate

expected_collateral_deposited.description: the expected amount of collateral increase on the loan

streaming_swap_seconds.description: The approximate number of seconds taken by the streaming swaps involved in the open loan process.

inbound_address.description: the inbound address for the transaction on the source chain

outbound_delay_blocks.description: the number of thorchain blocks the outbound will be delayed

streaming_swap_blocks.description: The number of blocks involved in the streaming swaps during the open loan process.

router.description: the EVM chain router contract address

expected_debt_issued.description: the expected amount of TOR debt increase on the loan

expected_collateralization_ratio.description: the expected collateralization ratio in basis points

total_open_loan_seconds.description: The total expected duration for a open loan, measured in seconds, which includes the time for inbound confirmation, the duration of streaming swaps, and any outbound delays.

memo.description: generated memo for the loan open

expected_amount_out.description: the amount of the target asset the user can expect to receive after fees in 1e8 decimals

affiliate_collector_rune.description: Amount of RUNE currently accrued by this thorname in affiliate fees waiting to be swapped to preferred asset.

next_since_height.description: height at which the minimum joining version last changed

next.description: next version (minimum version for a node to become Active)

height.description: the height of the keygen block

items.description: pubkeys of the keygen block member nodes

LP_units.description: the total pool liquidity provider units

savers_capacity_remaining.description: amount of remaining capacity in asset

synth_mint_paused.description: whether additional synths cannot be minted

loan_collateral_remaining.description: the amount of remaining collateral collects for loans

pool_units.description: the total pool units, this is the sum of LP and synth units

synth_supply_remaining.description: the amount of synth supply remaining before the current max supply is reached

loan_collateral.description: the amount of collateral collects for loans

asset_tor_price.description: the USD (TOR) price of the asset in 1e8

savers_depth.description: the balance of L1 asset deposited into the Savers Vault

savers_units.description: the number of units owned by Savers

synth_units.description: the total synth units in the pool

synth_supply.description: the total supply of synths for the asset

savers_fill_bps.description: the filled savers capacity in basis points, 4500/10000 = 45%

derived_depth_bps.description: the depth of the derived virtual pool relative to L1 pool (in basis points)

current_deposit.description: the current RUNE deposited by providers

units.description: the units of RUNEPool owned by providers (including pending)

pending_units.description: the units of RUNEPool owned by providers that remain pending

value.description: the value of the provider share of the RUNEPool (includes pending RUNE)

pnl.description: the profit and loss of the provider share of the RUNEPool

units.description: the units of RUNEPool owned by the reserve

value.description: the value of the reserve share of the RUNEPool

pnl.description: the profit and loss of the reserve share of the RUNEPool

current_deposit.description: the current RUNE deposited by the reserve

derived_depth_bps.description: the depth of the derived virtual pool relative to L1 pool (in basis points)

consensus_height.description: the thorchain height at which the inbound reached consensus

finalised_height.description: the thorchain height at which the outbound was finalised

outbound_height.description: the thorchain height for which the outbound was scheduled

aggregator_target_limit.description: the aggregator target asset limit provided to transferOutAndCall

aggregator.description: the outbound aggregator to use, will also match a suffix

aggregator_target.description: the aggregator target asset provided to transferOutAndCall

external_observed_height.description: the block height on the external source chain when the transaction was observed, not provided if chain is THOR

external_confirmation_delay_height.description: the block height on the external source chain when confirmation counting will be complete, not provided if chain is THOR

node_address.description: the node address of the voter

vote.description: the vote cast by the node

consensus_height.description: the thorchain height at which the inbound reached consensus

outbound_height.description: the thorchain height for which the outbound was scheduled

finalised_height.description: the thorchain height at which the outbound was finalised

rune_deposited.description: total amount of RUNE deposited into the pools

rune_withdrawn.description: total amount of RUNE withdrawn from the pools

value.description: total value of protocol's LP position in RUNE value

pnl.description: profit and loss of protocol owned liquidity

source_asset.description: the asset to be swapped from

failed_swaps.description: the list of swap indexes that failed

quantity.description: the total number of swaps in a streaming swaps

last_height.description: the block height of the latest swap

trade_target.description: the total number of tokens the swapper wants to receive of the output asset

failed_swap_reasons.description: the list of reasons that sub-swaps have failed

interval.description: how often each swap is made, in blocks

destination.description: the destination address to receive the swap output

target_asset.description: the asset to be swapped to

deposit.description: the number of input tokens the swapper has deposited

in.description: the amount of input tokens that have been swapped so far

out.description: the amount of output tokens that have been swapped so far

count.description: the amount of swap attempts so far

refund.description: returns true if the planned transaction has a refund memo

outbound.description: number of signed outbound tx in the queue

asset.description: the asset to display the outbound fee for

outbound_fee.description: the asset's outbound fee, in (1e8-format) units of the asset

fee_withheld_rune.description: Total RUNE the network has withheld as fees to later cover gas costs for this asset's outbounds

fee_spent_rune.description: Total RUNE the network has spent to reimburse gas costs for this asset's outbounds

surplus_rune.description: amount of RUNE by which the fee_withheld_rune exceeds the fee_spent_rune

dynamic_multiplier_basis_points.description: dynamic multiplier basis points, based on the surplus_rune, affecting the size of the outbound_fee

slippage_bps.description: the swap slippage in basis points

total_bps.description: total basis points in fees relative to amount out

asset.description: the target asset used for all fees

affiliate.description: affiliate fee in the target asset

outbound.description: outbound fee in the target asset

liquidity.description: liquidity fees paid to pools in the target asset

total.description: total fees in the target asset

broken.description: Returns true if the invariant is broken.

msg.description: Informative message about the invariant result.

gas_rate.description: The minimum fee rate used by vaults to send outbound TXs. The actual fee rate may be higher. For EVM chains this is returned in gwei (1e9).

outbound_fee.description: The total outbound fee charged to the user for outbound txs in the gas asset of the chain.

halted.description: Returns true if trading is unavailable for this chain, either because trading is halted globally or specifically for this chain

global_trading_paused.description: Returns true if trading is paused globally

chain_trading_paused.description: Returns true if trading is paused for this chain

dust_threshold.description: Defines the minimum transaction size for the chain in base units (sats, wei, uatom). Transactions with asset amounts lower than the dust_threshold are ignored.

chain_lp_actions_paused.description: Returns true if LP actions are paused for this chain

outbound_tx_size.description: Avg size of outbound TXs on each chain. For UTXO chains it may be larger than average, as it takes into account vault consolidation txs, which can have many vouts

approved_percent.description: the percentage of active validators that have approved the upgrade

validators_to_quorum.description: the amount of additional active validators required to reach quorum for the upgrade

height.description: the block height at which the upgrade will occur

info.description: the description of the upgrade, typically json with URLs to binaries for use with automation tools

approved.description: whether the upgrade has been approved by the active validators

expected_amount_out.description: the amount of the target asset the user can expect to receive after fees

inbound_confirmation_blocks.description: the approximate number of source chain blocks required before processing

notes.example: Transfer the inbound_address the asset with the memo. Do not use multi-in, multi-out transactions.

dust_threshold.description: Defines the minimum transaction size for the chain in base units (sats, wei, uatom). Transactions with asset amounts lower than the dust_threshold are ignored.

gas_rate_units.description: the units of the recommended gas rate

max_streaming_quantity.description: the maximum amount of trades a streaming swap can do for a trade

total_swap_seconds.description: total number of seconds a swap is expected to take (inbound conf + streaming swap + outbound delay)

inbound_address.description: the inbound address for the transaction on the source chain

inbound_confirmation_seconds.description: the approximate seconds for block confirmations required before processing

outbound_delay_blocks.description: the number of thorchain blocks the outbound will be delayed

streaming_swap_seconds.description: approx the number of seconds the streaming swap will execute over

streaming_swap_blocks.description: the number of blocks the streaming swap will execute over

outbound_delay_seconds.description: the approximate seconds for the outbound delay before it will be sent

router.description: the EVM chain router contract address

recommended_min_amount_in.description: The recommended minimum inbound amount for this transaction type & inbound asset. Sending less than this amount could result in failed refunds.

recommended_gas_rate.description: the recommended gas rate to use for the inbound to ensure timely confirmation

peer_id.description: the P2PID (:6040/p2pid endpoint) of the node

version.description: the currently set version of the node

observe_chains.description: the last observed heights for all chain by the node

active_block_height.description: the block height at which the node became active

signer_membership.description: the set of vault public keys of which the node is a member

forced_to_leave.description: indicates whether the node has been forced to leave by the network, typically via ban

validator_cons_pub_key.description: the consensus pub key for the node

status_since.description: the block height of the current provided information for the node

node_operator_fee.description: node operator fee in basis points

providers.description: all the bond providers for the node

slash_points.description: the accumulated slash points, reset at churn but excessive slash points may carry over

status.description: the next status of the node

reason.description: the reason for the transition to the next status

completed.description: returns true if the inbound transaction has been finalised (THORChain agreeing it exists)

interval.description: how often each swap is made, in blocks

quantity.description: the total number of swaps in a streaming swaps

count.description: the amount of swap attempts so far

completed.description: (to be deprecated in favor of swap_status) returns true if an inbound transaction's swap (successful or refunded) is no longer pending

remaining_delay_blocks.description: the number of remaining THORChain blocks the outbound will be delayed

remaining_delay_seconds.description: the estimated remaining seconds of the outbound delay before it will be sent

completed.description: returns true if no transaction outbound delay remains

scheduled_outbound_height.description: THORChain height for which the external outbound is scheduled

blocks_since_scheduled.description: THORChain blocks since the scheduled outbound height

completed.description: returns true if an external transaction has been signed and broadcast (and observed in its mempool)

final_count.description: number of signers for final observations, after any confirmation counting complete

completed.description: returns true if no transaction observation remains to be done

started.description: returns true if any nodes have observed the transaction (to be deprecated in favour of counts)

pre_confirmation_count.description: number of signers for pre-confirmation-counting observations

chain.description: the external source chain for which confirmation counting takes place

external_observed_height.description: the block height on the external source chain when the transaction was observed

external_confirmation_delay_height.description: the block height on the external source chain when confirmation counting will be complete

remaining_confirmation_seconds.description: the estimated remaining seconds before confirmation counting completes

completed.description: returns true if no transaction confirmation counting remains to be done

counting_start_height.description: the THORChain block height when confirmation counting began

finalised_height.description: the thorchain height at which the outbound was finalised

consensus_height.description: the thorchain height at which the inbound reached consensus

outbound_height.description: the thorchain height for which the outbound was scheduled

height.description: the block(s) in which a tx out item is scheduled to be signed and moved from the scheduled outbound queue to the outbound queue

address.description: address associated with this clout account

score.description: clout score, which is the amount of rune spent on swap fees

reclaimed.description: amount of clout that has been reclaimed in total over time (observed clout spent)

spent.description: amount of clout that has been spent in total over time

last_spent_height.description: last block height that clout was spent

last_reclaim_height.description: last block height that clout was reclaimed

inbound_address.description: the inbound address for the transaction on the source chain

outbound_delay_blocks.description: the number of thorchain blocks the outbound will be delayed

router.description: the EVM chain router contract address

gas_spent_rune.description: Sum of the gas the network has spent to send outbounds

outbound_fee_multiplier.description: Current outbound fee multiplier, in basis points

bond_reward_rune.description: total amount of RUNE awarded to node operators

gas_withheld_rune.description: Sum of the gas withheld from users to cover outbound gas

tns_register_fee_rune.description: the thorname register fee in rune, converted from the TNSRegisterFeeUSD mimir (after USD fees are enabled)

effective_security_bond.description: effective security bond used to determine maximum pooled RUNE

vaults_migrating.description: Returns true if there exist RetiringVaults which have not finished migrating funds to new ActiveVaults

tns_fee_per_block_rune.description: the thorname fee per block in rune, converted from the TNSFeePerBlockUSD mimir (after USD fees are enabled)

native_outbound_fee_rune.description: the outbound transaction fee in rune, converted from the NativeOutboundFeeUSD mimir (after USD fees are enabled)

native_tx_fee_rune.description: the native transaction fee in rune, converted from the NativeTransactionFeeUSD mimir (after USD fees are enabled)
